function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Complex geometry with non-convex convoluted structures creates challenges for optimization","Impact":"Suboptimal space layout may not effectively support social distancing and flow of people","Mitigation":"Use advanced optimization algorithms or software to account for complex geometry and constraints","Technologies":"Advanced optimization algorithms, CAD software, Unity 3D","People":"Architects, urban planners, space designers, facility managers","Owner":"Architectural firms, design companies, facility management teams"},{"Description":"Potential for suboptimal airflow within spaces due to complex geometry and constraints","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission due to poor ventilation","Mitigation":"Conduct airflow simulations and use HVAC systems to improve ventilation, consider air purifiers","Technologies":"Computational fluid dynamics (CFD) software, HVAC systems, air purifiers","People":"HVAC engineers, ventilation specialists, building managers","Owner":"Building management, HVAC service providers, ventilation specialists"},{"Description":"Inability to effectively implement social distancing and other physical constraints in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission among occupants","Mitigation":"Implement automated optimal design methods and technologies for physical space layouts, provide clear signage for traffic flow and distancing","Technologies":"Optimization software, BIM (Building Information Modeling), digital signage","People":"Architects, facility managers, building owners","Owner":"Architectural firms, facility management teams, building owners"}]}
